title: Harin, Manusha to leave for Geneva to take up Ranjan’s case
content: Two Samagi Jana Balawegaya MPs Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakkara are to leave for Geneva on Monday February 28, 2022 to take up the case of Former MP Ranjan Ramanayake who is currently serving a jail sentence for contempt of Court, one of the MPs said today.MP Harin Fernando told the Daily Mirror that he and fellow Parliamentarian Manusha Nanayakkara will leave for Geneva on Monday. “We shall take up Ranjan Ramanayake's case in Geneva,” he said.
